title: Build My Quit Plan
text: Make your personalized quit plan and get ready to quit vaping or smoking. Thinking ahead now can make things easier later.

title: Vaping Reality Check
text: Vaping may be costing you more than yo uthink. Knowing more can help you decide what to do about it

title: How to Quit Vaping
text: Quitting vapes can be easier when you prepare in advance. Get tips and resources to help you quit for good.

title: Your First Day Without Vaping
text: The first day without vaping can be tough. Get tips and resources to help you get through it.

title: Deal With Vape Cravings
text: Cravings can be tough, but they don't last forever. Get tips and resources to help you deal with them.

title: Understand Your Vape Triggers
text: Triggers are the things that make you want to vape. Learn what your triggers are and how to deal with them.

title: Vaping Addiction and Nicotine Withdrawal
text: Nicotine is in most vapes, and it's addictive. Learn about nicotine withdrawal and how to deal with it.

title: Anxiety, Stress, and Vaping
text: Stress and anxiety can make it harder to quit vaping. Learn how to deal with stress and anxiety without vaping.

title: Depression and Vaping
text: Some people vape when they are feeling sad or down. Learn how to deal with depression without vaping.
